item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: ü§ñ New EIP: XXXX
By: - Charlie Noyes -Dan Robinson -Justin Drake -Toni Wahrst√§tter
üîó https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9241
This EIP proposes delaying the ExecutionPayload's state root reference by one block, so that for each block `n`, the `state_root` in block `n`'s `ExecutionPayload` references the post-state of block `n-1`. This change aims to remove the expensive state root computation from the block-propagation critical path, reducing end-to-end latency for block production and potentially increasing throughput. It simplifies the block production pipeline, accelerates real-time ZK proving, and is a consensus-breaking change requiring a coordinated hard fork.
item.dc:creator: @ethresearchbot
item.description:
ü§ñ New EIP: XXXX

By:
- Charlie Noyes
-Dan Robinson
-Justin Drake
-Toni Wahrst√§tter

üîó github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pul‚Ä¶

This EIP proposes delaying the ExecutionPayload's state root reference by one block, so that for each block `n`, the `state_root` in block `n`'s `ExecutionPayload` references the post-state of block `n-1`. This change aims to remove the expensive state root computation from the block-propagation critical path, reducing end-to-end latency for block production and potentially increasing throughput. It simplifies the block production pipeline, accelerates real-time ZK proving, and is a consensus-breaking change requiring a coordinated hard fork.

item.title:

I'm writing an article and Satoshi, Vitalik and Sreeram texts and talks are the best to explain the core ideas of our industry and the ethos I believe in.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: Why EigenLayer AI? ------------------------------ Great article trying to decode why eigenlayer is helping build AI agents. ------------------------------ The eigenlayer-AI thesis *starting point* is super simple: ------------------------------ EigenLayer is trust for offchain compute.
The most important offchain compute is for AI.
Therefore it is a clear PMF. ------------------------------ Furthermore, specifically, AI agents not only need verifiable inference but also verifiable data, verifiable models, verifiable oracles, verifiable real-world actions, etc. ------------------------------ Even without AI agents, when you have AI computation as secure as smart contracts onchain, EVERYTHING in blockchain changes: How are smart contracts written? How are contracts implemented? How are user intents sourced? How DAOs are built? How security and risk analysis is performed? How memecoins work? ------------------------------ Very few people have perceived this and @eigenlayer is in a perfect position to lead this revolution. ------------------------------ EigenLayer has the universe of Autonomous Verifiable Services.
EigenLayer will power the universe of AI agents AND unleash AI-native blockchains!
item.dc:creator: @sreeramkannan
item.description:
Why EigenLayer AI?
------------------------------
Great article trying to decode why eigenlayer is helping build AI agents.
------------------------------
The eigenlayer-AI thesis *starting point* is super simple:
------------------------------
EigenLayer is trust for offchain compute.

The most important offchain compute is for AI.

Therefore it is a clear PMF.
------------------------------
Furthermore, specifically, AI agents not only need verifiable inference but also verifiable data, verifiable models, verifiable oracles, verifiable real-world actions, etc.
------------------------------
Even without AI agents, when you have AI computation as secure as smart contracts onchain, EVERYTHING in blockchain changes:
How are smart contracts written?
How are contracts implemented?
How are user intents sourced?
How DAOs are built?
How security and risk analysis is performed?
How memecoins work?
------------------------------
Very few people have perceived this and @eigenlayer is in a perfect position to lead this revolution.
------------------------------
EigenLayer has the universe of Autonomous Verifiable Services.

EigenLayer will power the universe of AI agents AND unleash AI-native blockchains!
